api_list.name: Get sign prediction for today  by name
api_list.description: Get sign prediction for today  by name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zodiacapi1.p.rapidapi.com/api/zodiac-signs/{name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zodiacapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests
